LanguageData.PutInInducedComa2Days.label: 昏睡状態にする (~2 日間)
LanguageData.PutInInducedComa2Days.description: Puts someone in an induced coma for around two days.
LanguageData.PutInInducedComa5Days.label: 昏睡状態にする (~5 日間)
LanguageData.PutInInducedComa5Days.description: Puts someone in an induced coma for around five days.
LanguageData.PutInInducedComa15Days.label: 昏睡状態にする (~15 日間)
LanguageData.PutInInducedComa15Days.description: Puts someone in an induced coma for around one season.
LanguageData.PutInInducedComa30Days.label: 昏睡状態にする (~30 日間)
LanguageData.PutInInducedComa30Days.description: Puts someone in an induced coma for around half a year.
LanguageData.PutInInducedComaForever.label: 昏睡状態にする (期間不明)
LanguageData.PutInInducedComaForever.description: Puts someone in an induced coma for ... a very, very long time.
